title: Korean Font

embed.description: ‪korean font league of legends‬‏ - חיפוש ב-Google

body:
So today ive changed my Client and Ingame font to the korean one which is a thin letters
everything is ok and as i wanted , Except My summoner name which is still Bold Font ..
How can i change it to Thin letters also ?
Any help? would appreciate

replies.body: Unfortunately, we don't support language, fonts, or game modifications beyond the [languages supported ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language)for each region.  Doing this is at your own risk, and could cause instability issues or crashes.  I recommend switching to the normal language, as we won't be able to support any issues caused by this.
